origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.risk_management_course', 'description': 'This function provides a comprehensive course on financial risk management tailored to specific industries, including types of risks, common tools, industry-specific analysis, and case studies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'courseContent', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The content of the course, can be 'all' for a full course or specific sections.'}, {'name': 'industryFocus', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to focus on for the course, e.g., banking, insurance, technology.'}, {'name': 'caseStudy', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include real-world case studies in the course.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'courseOutline', 'description': 'A detailed outline of the course content.'}, {'name': 'caseStudyExamples', 'description': 'Examples of case studies if 'caseStudy' is set to true.'}]} 
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
我想学习金融风险管理，首先，讲解金融风险的类型和成因。然后，获取金融风险管理的常用工具和方法。接着，分析不同行业的金融风险特点。最后，提供金融风险管理的案例分析。我选择的行业是银行业，我需要包含案例分析的完整课程。
